Pre-Game Insights: The Orlando Magic are as injured as any team in the league, but they continue to find ways to win and cover numbers.
The Utah Jazz are on the end of a back-to-back, and they're in a letdown spot after a surprising blowout win over the Heat.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic have won each of their last 28 games at Kia Center against teams that held a losing record.
The Jazz have lost each of their last eight road games against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
The Magic have covered the spread in nine of their last 10 games at Kia Center following a win.
The Jazz have failed to cover the spread in five of their last six games as underdogs against opponents who are on the first leg of a back-to-back.
Others: Randy Chambers predicts the Orlando Magic to win against the Utah Jazz.
Randy Chambers' pick is Orlando Magic -6.5
